name: Robert C. Holte
content: Dr. Robert Holte Robert Holte Professor Emeritus Office: 3-29 Athabasca Hall Email: rholte@ualberta.ca *** I AM NO LONGER ACCEPTING NEW GRADUATE STUDENTS *** Selected Publications my publications related to Abstraction and Search my publications related to Machine Learning my publications related to Games my publications related to Network Routing my publications related to Combinatorial Auctions my publications related to Intelligent Information Access my publications on other topics my Curriculum Vitae as of November 18, 2022 (PDF) Useful Local (U. of Alberta) Links Cost Curve Software and related papers Research-related Software, Datasets, and Other Sites University of Ottawa sites General CS and AI sites Machine Learning sites Abstraction and Search sites sites related to Combinatorial Auctions and Knapsack Problems Talk on ROC analysis Colleagues Michael Bowling Chris Drummond Ariel Felner Randy Goebel Russ Greiner Dale Schuurmans Rich Sutton Csaba Szepesvari Sandra Zilles Teaching Lecture notes and example programs (and other junk) for my 4 hour "all you need to know" lecture about the functional programming language ML Data Structures Course - Lecture Notes AAAI'05 Tutorial on Using Abstraction to Create Heuristics Some useful links related to single-agent search Some information about Ada Lovelace links related to Garbage Collection Stuff of Personal Interest Address Robert Holte 3-29 Athabasca Hall Department of Computing Science University of Alberta Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, T6G 2E8 Email: rholte@ualberta.ca
